sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词的均含"设计，设想"之意。
means: devise ： 侧重设计的临时性和权宜性，并隐含有更多的设想可用。
conceive ： 强调在制定计划之前的先有设想构思。
formulate与conceive相反，指在devise之后的具体设计活动。

word_mean: 按处方或特定方法制备

sentence.Network_en: He took care to formulate his reply very clearly.
sentence.Network_cn: 他字斟句酌,清楚地做了回答.

sentence.Network_en: We should formulate a long - term program for scientific and technological development.
sentence.Network_cn: 制定科学和技术 长远 发展规划.

sentence.Network_en: I was impressed by the way he could formulate his ideas.
sentence.Network_cn: 他陈述观点的方式让我印象深刻。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 造_百度百科 ... （12）撰写；汇集[ compile] （14）制定[ work up;formulate;work out] （16）建立[ set up].
新东方名师梅晗解析剑8阅读_新东方在线 ... clime n. 气候带； formulate v. 制定；规划；确切表达 municipal adj. 市政的.

一段情两颗❤ 三个字 。 ... 144. fluctuate n. 波动 145. formulate v. 构想 147. fragile a. 易碎的;脆弱的.

list.abs: ...逐步从药物分子设计领域渗透到其它的产品设计领域,如配方(formulations)、润滑剂、添加剂设计领域。
项目管理术语英汉对照表 - MBA智库百科 ... Forming 组建形成 Formulation 公式化 Forward Pass 正推法.
各种各样的主义 ... 军国主义 militarism 公式主义 formulism 法西斯主义 fascism.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from formula + -ate, on the pattern of French formuler, from medieval Latin formulare

entry.def: If you formulate something such as a plan or proposal, you invent it, thinking about the details carefully.

example.ex: Little by little, he formulated his plan for escape.
example.tran: 他一点一点地设计构思出了逃跑的方案。

entry.def: If you formulate a thought, opinion, or idea, you express it or describe it using particular words.

example.ex: I was impressed by the way he could formulate his ideas.
example.tran: 他陈述观点的方式让我印象深刻。

means.word_mean: 1. elaborate, as of theories and hypotheses;

sentences.sentence: "Could you develop the ideas in your thesis"

means.word_mean: 2. come up with (an idea, plan, explanation, theory, or priciple) after a mental effort;

sentences.sentence: "excogitate a way to measure the speed of light"

means.word_mean: 3. put into words or an expression;

sentences.sentence: "He formulated his concerns to the board of trustees"

auth_sentence.content: If so, formulate a survival strategy and act quickly.
auth_sentence.res_content: If so, formulate a survival strategy and act quickly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If so, formulate a survival strategy and act quickly.

auth_sentence.content: We can formulate our belief systems as we deem logical.
auth_sentence.res_content: We can formulate our belief systems as we deem logical.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We can formulate our belief systems as we deem logical.

auth_sentence.content: Demonstrated ability to formulate and solve problems.
auth_sentence.res_content: Demonstrated ability to formulate and solve problems.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Demonstrated ability to formulate and solve problems.

Sentence.sentence: What was chaos theory supposed to do when it was first formulated?

sentences.en: He formulated a plan of attack.
He took care to formulate his reply very clearly.
sentences.cn: 他字斟句酌, 清楚地做了回答。

jushi.english: He formulated a plan of attack.
He took care to formulate his reply very clearly.
jushi.chinese: 他字斟句酌,清楚地做了回答。

jushi.english: The laws were formulated according to constitution.
jushi.chinese: 法律是根据宪法制定的。
